attributes.action: Deliver on pledges for further devolution to Scotland and demand identical settlements for England, Wales and Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
The people of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland demand that the Westminster government make good on their guarantees of further devolution of powers to the Scottish government in the publicly promised time frame and the preservation of current funding to public services.

In the interests of fairness and of true democracy we also demand that identical settlements are made for England, Wales and Northern Ireland.

This decentralisation of power will be in the best interest of all the people of the UK, returning a measure of power to the voting person to dictate how, and by whom, they are governed.
